CreateConfigurationManager.name: CreateConfigurationManager
CreateConfigurationManager.description: Grants permission to create a Quick Setup configuration manager resource

DeleteConfigurationManager.name: DeleteConfigurationManager
DeleteConfigurationManager.description: Grants permission to delete a configuration manager

GetConfigurationManager.name: GetConfigurationManager
GetConfigurationManager.description: Grants permission to get a configuration manager

GetServiceSettings.name: GetServiceSettings
GetServiceSettings.description: Grants permission to get settings configured for Quick Setup in the requesting AWS account and AWS Region

ListConfigurationManagers.name: ListConfigurationManagers
ListConfigurationManagers.description: Grants permission to list Quick Setup configuration managers

ListQuickSetupTypes.name: ListQuickSetupTypes
ListQuickSetupTypes.description: Grants permission to list the available Quick Setup types

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags assigned to the resource

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to Assign key-value pairs of metadata to AWS resources

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified resource

UpdateConfigurationDefinition.name: UpdateConfigurationDefinition
UpdateConfigurationDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a Quick Setup configuration definition

UpdateConfigurationManager.name: UpdateConfigurationManager
UpdateConfigurationManager.description: Grants permission to update a Quick Setup configuration manager

UpdateServiceSettings.name: UpdateServiceSettings
UpdateServiceSettings.description: Grants permission to update settings configured for Quick Setup
